HiddenText.Name: Who can take online courses?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: BYU-Idaho Online Courses are open to many different types of students. On-track, off-track, online degrees, Pathway, and Continuing Education students are all eligible to enroll. We encourage students to review our available programs and apply through the option that best fits their needs. As long as you are admitted as a student, you can sign up for an online course. You register online according to the registration schedule, just like you would for a regular course.
